attack verb
(HURT)
B1 [ I or T ] to try to hurt or defeat using violence: He was attacked and seriously injured by a gang of youths. Army forces have been attacking the town since dawn. Most wild animals won't attack unless they are provoked. Compare
defend (PROTECT)
